EmailTemplate.name: CR 3.1.3 Reject - average candidate post call
EmailTemplate.subject: Your application for The Challenge 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed.
Dear {!Contact.Name}
Following your phone call with your Programme Manager, it has been agreed that you will no longer be returning to work with us on our seasonal programmes.
Although this decision may not be the outcome you had wished for, we hope that the feedback you received was helpful to you.
Thank you for your contribution to our previous seasonal programmes, and we wish you success in your future ventures.
Best Wishes
The Challenge Email Reference: CR 3.1.3
